name: PresentMoment
0:
”Alexa, Open Present Moment”
”Alexa, ask Present Moment for a quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: present moment
des:
Be inspired by random quotes from world renowned spiritual teacher and author Eckhart Tolle (Unofficial skill).

Take a moment each day to be present and embrace the power of the Now.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Present Moment" or "Alexa, open Present Moment" to get a quote.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
